alert.note: Alert for Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 03 at 2:27PM CDT until September 03 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Mississippi, including the following county, Stone. * WHEN...Until 530 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 226 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. If heavy rain continues then a flash flood warning may be needed for areas of Wiggins. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wiggins, Perkinston, Bond, Ten Mile, Texas and Big Level.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
